channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Human Trafficking Ringleader Arrested After 6 Years on the Run
item.description: A man convicted of leading a human trafficking ring in Taiwan has been arrested after a six-year search. He is suspected to have illegally brought hundreds of people into the count

item.title: Analysis: KMT Delegation Goes to China
item.description: A delegation of KMT officials and lawmakers has visited Beijing and met with Chinese officials. TaiwanPlus spoke with political analyst Courtney Donovan Smith about the significanc

item.title: Foreign Ministry Says 37,000 Taiwan Passports Lost in 2023
item.description: Taiwan's foreign ministry says some 37,000 Taiwanese passports went missing last year and it's getting harder for authorities to tell if the losses are genuine or fraudulent.

item.title: Death Toll Rises to 4 in Taipei Restaurant Food Poisoning Scandal
item.description: Taiwan's health ministry says two people have died from multiple organ failure, raising the death toll to four in a Taipei restaurant food poisoning scandal linked to a deadly toxi
